name: Digger
overview: Digger is a one or two player game. It is a clone of the classic Dig Dug, even the monster's names are the same. Game play involves digging through the earth avoiding two monsters, called Pooka and Fygar, and eating vegetable power ups. The game has a high score table, optional sound, and a choice of difficulty levels. It can be played via keyboard or joystick.
